content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-86.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- 4 Wooden chests at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)
All mining coal from coal patches

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Mining setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5)

### Iron Ore Processing Line at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Mining and processing line with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests and burner inserters for item movement
- Transport belt system connecting components

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Large smelting setup with:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Multiple burner inserters and wooden chests for input/output
- Transport belt system for item movement

### Power Generation at position(x=4.5, y=20.5)
Power system consisting of:
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric poles creating power network

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to extract from empty/non-existent containers
- Verify chest contains items before attempting extraction
- Check if chest exists at target coordinates before extraction

### Errors in crafting operations
- Ensure all required ingredients are available in inventory before crafting
- Verify recipe requirements are met before initiating craft

### Entity placement and connection issues
- Some inserters are waiting for source items - ensure proper item flow
- Some mining drills are out of fuel - maintain fuel supply
- Some fluid systems not properly connected - verify pipe connections

### Full container handling
- Chest at (-5.5,-55.5) is full - implement logic to handle full containers
- Add overflow protection or additional storage capacity
